participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Driven and enthusiastic about his studies, Ethan is dedicated and focused on achieving his academic goals. He enjoys engaging in meaningful conversations and has a passion for geology.
participant_1.background: I have a girlfriend of 7 years. I am a geology major at Alabama University. I never have had alcohol in my life. I watch every football game at Alabama.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Creative and imaginative, Lena expresses herself through her art. She is sociable and enjoys meeting new people, often engaging in discussions about her favorite shows and comics.
participant_2.background: I work in a corner grocery store during the day. My favorite show is Scooby Doo. I draw comic books. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punk rock.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a geology major at Alabama University.
That's cool! I'm a comic book artist.
Oh, that's awesome! I love comic books.
Thanks! I've been drawing them since I was a kid.
That's really impressive. I'm sure you're really good at it.
What's your favorite comic book series?
I'm a big fan of the X-Men.
Me too! I love the X-Men. They're my favorite superhero team.
Me too! I love their diversity and their stories.
What are you most excited about in your life right now?
I'm most excited about going to graduate school next year.
That's awesome! What are you going to study?
That sounds really cool! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks! I think I will too.
